name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that is used to identify this evidence variable when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at which an authoritative instance of this evidence variable is (or will be) published. This URL can be the target of a canonical reference. It SHALL remain the same when the evidence variable is stored on different servers.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this evidence variable when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at which

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A formal identifier that is used to identify this evidence variable when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $addidentifier
desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this evidence variable when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this evidence variable when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the evidence variable when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the evidence variable author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence. To provide a version consistent with the Decision Support Service specification, use the format Major.Minor.Revision (e.g. 1.0.0). For more information on versioning knowledge assets, refer to the Decision Support Service specification. Note that a version is required for non-experimental active artifacts.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the evidence variable when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the evidence variable author and is not expected to be globally unique

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A natural language name identifying the evidence variable. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the evidence variable. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the evidence variable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the evidence variable.

name: $shortTitle
desc: Returns: The short title provides an alternate title for use in informal descriptive contexts where the full, formal title is not necessary.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The short title provides an alternate title for use in informal descriptive contexts where the full, formal title is not necessary.

name: $subtitle
desc: Returns: An explanatory or alternate title for the EvidenceVariable giving additional information about its content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An explanatory or alternate title for the EvidenceVariable giving additional information about its content.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of this evidence variable. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of this evidence variable. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date  (and optionally time) when the evidence variable was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the evidence variable changes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the evidence variable was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the evidence vari

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: The name of the organization or individual that published the evidence variable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the evidence variable.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the evidence variable from a consumer's perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the evidence variable from a consumer's perspective.

name: $note
desc: Returns: A human-readable string to clarify or explain concepts about the resource.

name: $addnote
desc: A human-readable string to clarify or explain concepts about the resource.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A human-readable string to clarify or explain concepts about the resource.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate evidence variable instances.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate evidence variable instances.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist w

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A legal or geographic region in which the evidence variable is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A legal or geographic region in which the evidence variable is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the evidence variable is intended to be used.

name: $copyright
desc: Returns: A copyright statement relating to the evidence variable and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the evidence variable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the evidence variable and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the evidence variable.

name: $approvalDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

name: $lastReviewDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

name: $effectivePeriod
desc: Returns: The period during which the evidence variable content was or is planned to be in active use.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period during which the evidence variable content was or is planned to be in active use.

name: $topic
desc: Returns: Descriptive topics related to the content of the EvidenceVariable. Topics provide a high-level categorization grouping types of EvidenceVariables that can be useful for filtering and searching.

name: $addtopic
desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the EvidenceVariable. Topics provide a high-level categorization grouping types of EvidenceVariables that can be useful for filtering and searching.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the EvidenceVariable. Topics provide a high-level categorization grouping types of EvidenceVariables that can be useful for filtering and searching.

name: $author
desc: Returns: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

name: $addauthor
desc: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

name: $editor
desc: Returns: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

name: $addeditor
desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

name: $reviewer
desc: Returns: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

name: $addreviewer
desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

name: $endorser
desc: Returns: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

name: $addendorser
desc: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

name: $relatedArtifact
desc: Returns: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

name: $addrelatedArtifact
desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of evidence element, a population, an exposure, or an outcome.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of evidence element, a population, an exposure, or an outcome.

name: $characteristic
desc: Returns: A characteristic that defines the members of the evidence element. Multiple characteristics are applied with "and" semantics.

name: $addcharacteristic
desc: A characteristic that defines the members of the evidence element. Multiple characteristics are applied with "and" semantics.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A characteristic that defines the members of the evidence element. Multiple characteristics are applied with "and" semantics.
